name: The imaginner
description:
How to play

Use W, A, S, D (up, down, left, right) to move, SPACE to jump, E to interact. At the screen “practice your pronunciation” is the core of the game, press E to activate your microphone and try to repeat

The answer expected, if you hit, win coins otherwise you lost coins.

When your coins end you lost the game.

Every 10 seconds, coins will be dropped for specific areas of the scenario for a short period of time, so keep your eyes open

Warning

To have a full experience you need to have a microphone (‘fone’, ‘headphone’, etc…) connected to the game can recover your voice and convert it into text
